2.Name: Proper Gallop
2.Description: Your form on horseback rivals the legends of old!

1.Name: Sure Gallop
1.Description: You are a confident equine handler.

-1.Name: Wobbly Gallop
-1.Description: Stability on horseback is an art you still seek to develop.

-2.Name: Unstable Gallop
-2.Description: It is a wonder the gods haven't struck you off your horse yet.

3.Name: Veteran Fighter
3.Description: No man who faces you can dream of emerging victorious!

2.Name: Stalwart Fighter
2.Description: Hopeful fighters see you as a strong opponent.

1.Name: Rookie Fighter
1.Description: You stand your ground and fight, a tried and true fighter.

-1.Name: Basic Fighter
-1.Description: You can fight with most opponents, but are nothing special.

-2.Name: Clumsy Fighter
-2.Description: Your strikes sometimes land, and other times miss completely.

-3.Name: Weak Fighter
-3.Description: A river fish would have an easier time fighting an opponent than you.

2.Name: Imposing Commander
2.Description: Your word on the battlefield carries great pride and morale!

1.Name: Confident Commander
1.Description: Those you lead have faith in your firm words.

-1.Name: Unconfident Commander
-1.Description: Eyebrows raise at the majority of your requests.

-2.Name: Incompetent Commander
-2.Description: You would be lucky if any turned to you when you spoke.

1.Name: Has Tutor
1.Description: Your friend has agreed to tutor you however you can only progress if you put the effort in.

1.Name: Writer
1.Description: You are skiled, even flamboyant, with a pen. Your words can be kind, or cruel.

1.Name: Orator
1.Description: When you speak others listen, you are charming, eloquent and commanding.

1.Name: Master Of Dialectic
1.Description: Your logical reasoning is razor sharp, you cut through weak arguments with ease.
